TopicTitle: So I might be getting a plush rug...

Articles.Content: Do you guys have any? And, do you know online vendors who have good prices?

Yes - I love my plush rug.

Can't recommend a vendor since I think I live in a different country to you. Everything in my country is expensive anyhow, lol

Do you guys have any? And, do you know online vendors who have good prices?

I had to look that up because I didn't know what a plush rug was. Back in my day we called them shag carpet or rugs.
